channel.title: The resolve is pretty obvious -.-
channel.description:
Well, as you know the download section is full of morons. From leechers to idiots who over and over again posts in wrong section. Been having this on mind for awhile and it's pretty obvious how to fix this... before reading the text below, try to figure out.
Since the tutorial section is locked by approval system whitch means moderators has to check it before it gets posted for real, why not add this in the download section? where it is actually needed? I dont know what you think but it's pretty obvious resolve.
/jake
If i spelled something wrong please tell me - - - - - - V

item.title: The resolve is pretty obvious -.-
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:24, topic:422410”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=525079.msg3824040#msg3824040 date=1322012835]

Oh, and if we CAN somehow do something like that (Make members for approving the topics for certain boards, but no symbols or anything saying who they are or for recognition) it would be a great idea, mods wouldn’t need to do it, thats one less responsibility they need to take care of, and like I said, I would be the last to be even considered, but if I would qualify, I’d do it, I have WAYY too much free time sometimes lol

Used to be yes, when it was there users wanted it removed, now it’s gone people want it back, can’t win…
If I recall correctly, it was a limitation of the forum upgrade anyway, so even if we did want it back I’m not sure it’d be possible.

Like he said it probably wouldn’t even be possible though, and honestly I don’t think it’s really needed…
[/quote]

I think it’s needed. All these gay advertisers pop up out of nowhere when a mod is offline, and members like me get pissed.[/quote]
I remember this one dude, mr silabsoft, who was F A I L S or something with a new acc cuz he was mad (was trolling or something and death muted him) and no one was there to stop him, me and him were practically the only ones online at the time… he did alot of it before someone finally came in the morning or something and finally cleaned it all up, see, if we had some people like that, it could have been preventable, because they have a duty and they would stay online longer to… well… do it, and like I said, a visible sign or anything like mopar mods and other badges, that wouldn’t be needed, best keep it secret, or not even, there would be no point of it, its just a duty, if they want to do it, they can.

Read full topic

If I recall correctly, it was a limitation of the forum upgrade anyway, so even if we did want it back I’m not sure it’d be possible.

Like he said it probably wouldn’t even be possible though, and honestly I don’t think it’s really needed…[/quote]
yeah, this idea has been proposed for a while now… oh well, but couldn’t you just write a mod for that or something? I mean, you can do that with smf, amiright?

And the reason it would be needed, in my opinion, is to bring sense back into servers here, now its just pi this, pi that,
[PI] HALPPPP, and just a shit load of leeches and viruses, and it would be a great idea, because there are some people here who I’m pretty sure are willing to do this, and we can keep all of that off here and on r-s or something

item.title: The resolve is pretty obvious -.-
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Wet Dreamss:

but Mopar does need sum moar staff

Hardly? Most of the time there’s either no reports or 1 or 2, if anything, the users need to report more. And no, it is not our job to go through the whole forum and find the rule breaking topics ourselves.

Saphire`:

It used to be moderated, they removed that feature. It wasn’t necessary and not many people could create a server good enough for moderators expectations.

Used to be yes, when it was there users wanted it removed, now it’s gone people want it back, can’t win…
If I recall correctly, it was a limitation of the forum upgrade anyway, so even if we did want it back I’m not sure it’d be possible.
